yojanawaliya sabhagatha kerunu awasthawe uthuru palath sabhawe manthi්rani aannadi sasitharan sitiye thamilnaduweya.thamilnaduwe wiwidha kandayam munagasiiි wayama sarthaka kara ganimata’ ema kandayam wala udawu labaganima ayage sancharaye aramuna wuni.aya mema yojanawaliya wenuwen dadiwa peni sitiyaya.ayage samiya wanne el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaye deshapalana anshaye nayakayawa siti elilanya.ohu aarakshaka ansha athin ghathanaya wiya.elilange saba nama sinnadureyi shashindran we.demala sandhanaye hawulkara pakshayak wana ilanෙge thamil arusu kachchi pakshaye samajikawak wana aanandi sasthi්rayange paksha samajikathwaya me wana wita thibenuye athhituwa wuwath ayata palath sabhawe rauswim walata sahabhagi wime awasaraya himiya.thama pakshaye thirana wiwechanaya kirima nisath,janadhipathiwaranaya ullanghanaya kala yuthuyayi pa්rasiddhiye pa්rakasha kirima nisath ayage paksha samajikathwaya athhituwimata nayakayo piyawara gena thibe.
ithiri kirime bankuwe adhyakasha mandalaya illa aswu pamanin prashnaya wisendanne naha.

pinwath mahaneni, yam dawasaka bhikshuwa thula yam aashrawayan darshanaya thulin nathikara damiya yuthu nam, ee aashrawayan darshanaya thulin nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan sanwara wimen nathi kala yuthu nam, sanwara wimen ee aashrawayan da nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan nuwanin salaka pawichchiyen nathi kala yuthu nam, nuwanin salaka pawichchiyen ee aashrawayan da nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan wiriyen yuthuwa iwasimen nathi kala yuthu nam, wiriyen yuthuwa iwasimen ee aashrawayan da nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan nuwanin salaka magahara damimen prahanaya kala yuthu nam, nuwanin salaka magaharimen ee aashrawayan da nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan nuwanin salaka duru kirimen prahanaya kala yuthu nam, nuwanin salaka duru kirimen ee aashrawayan da nathi wela gihin nam, yam aashrawayan bojjhanga dharmayan diyunu kirimen prahanaya kala yuthu nam, bojjhanga dharmayan diyunu kirimen ee aashrawayan da prahanaya wela gihin nam, pinwath mahaneni, anna ee bhikshuwatayi kiyanne siyalu aakaraye aashrawayangen sanwara wu kena kiyala.

issara eya kochchiyen bahala duwan enakan balan hitapu hati,nuwara stesama issaraha paththen.ee dawaswala ee gaswala mal pipenawa.peliyata gas namayak thibba.namayama rosa pata mal poronawakin wahila thibba.pemant eketh mal kapat eka.ekama gahak thibba wena jathiyaka,mal pipuneth nathi.gas peliyen mal watenawa nonawathwa.hama mohothema malak watemin thibba.eya aawa ee athirilla dige man dihawata.habayi ee sathi dekak witharayi.man eyage passen awurudu thunak giya.
